00014 void media(char *path) {
00015     struct dirent **files;
00016 
00017     // gets dir listing ignoring case and hidden files
00018     int file_num = scandir_b( path, &files,
00019         ^ (struct dirent * s) { return (s->d_name[0] != '.'); },
00020         ^ (const void * a, const void * b) {
00021             return strcasecmp( DIRENT(a)->d_name, DIRENT(b)->d_name);
00022         }
00023     );
00024 
00025     for(int i = 0; i < file_num; i++) {
00026         printf("%s\n", files[i]->d_name);
00027     }
00028     
00029     printf("%i\n", match(files[0]->d_name,".");
00030     
00031 }
00032 
00034 int match(const char *string, char *pattern) {
00035     int    status;
00036     regex_t    re;
00037 
00038     if (regcomp(&re, pattern, REG_EXTENDED | REG_ICASE | REG_NOSUB) != 0) {
00039         return(0);      
00040     }
00041     status = regexec(&re, string, (size_t) 0, NULL, 0);
00042     regfree(&re);
00043     if (status != 0) {
00044         return(0);      
00045     }
00046     return(1);
00047 }
